title: 2016/04/28 - Client Disconnects and Login issues
body:
Hi All,

We're aware of issues that are causing players to be disconnected from PVP.Net and unable to log back in.  We're currently investigating this issue and will update ASAP.  Ranked has been disabled and loss prevented enabled whilst we resolve the issue. 

7:40 PM AEDT - You should now be able to login to the client. We're still seeing intermittent issues with disconnection. We will update further as investigation continues. 

7:50 PM AEDT - The disconnect issues have been resolved - and connectivity should be fully back to normal. Ranked queues have now been re-enabled

I have honestly had enough of loading the client up and the game quickly only to have it say attempting to reconnect immediately given 32ms. I notice that though it freezes up, when I am alt tabbed out from the game, I can hear the noises of the game (abilities, pinging, kill announcements etc) as if it was running normally. When I alt tab back in it says attempting to reconnect once more, everyone freezes and all sound stops. Given I can buffer 720p+ videos very reasonably, it is definitely clear that there is nothing wrong with my internet.

Hey

Sorry to hear you are having these issues - this particular case does not sound like the server issue in the OP though.  That said, you could try going through our page on [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if that helps.  If you're still having issues you can also get in touch with the player support team, who will work through what could be causing this.   You can [submit a request here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)
